title: Tuesday Post Show (02-01-22)
itunes:title: Tuesday Post Show (02-01-22)
description:
Bobby starts with a list of the worst foods. Bobby on seeing two yellow cars on the drive into work today and not understanding why someone would buy a yellow car. We debate the best colors for cars. We answer a random caller and Bobby gives her a shot to win some money. Amy also thinks she may have been scammed on Venmo and we investigate. Eddie’s friend has a question about how Bobby and Amy watch so many new TV shows. We also debate “Fame”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
